main.name: Mike Stagg
main.bio: Hi there! I am Mike Stagg! I've been coding for over 4 years now as a Full-Stack Developer. I am highly motivated and I am always learning and expanding my knowledge base. I am able to pick up new skills quickly, as I have the necessary drive and determination to achieve anything. I pay attention to trends and new technologies to stay on the cutting edge of the industry. I also thrive within a team environment and work well with others.

resume.skillmessage: Programming Languages, Technologies, and Other Skills:

work.title: IT-Manufacturing Support
work.description: I Worked with network infrastructure, hardware, and software programs to maintain, update, and expand manufacturing capabilities at Giga Texas. I connected, supported, and troubleshot manufacturing devices and networks. I also worked to develop and maintain in-house software tools.

work.title: IT/CS Tutor
work.description: I Help students learn about the world of IT and Computer Programming. Together we practice paired programming and troubleshoot Code. I take pride helping people overcome their challenges and learn about engineering. I am passionate about this type of problem solving, and I feel these skills directly translate into my work in the industry.

quotes.text: I am not a visionary. I'm an engineer. I'm happy with the people who are wandering around looking at the stars, but I am looking at the ground, and I want to fix the pothole before I fall in.
An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity, a physicist tries to make it simple, for an idiot anything the more complicated it is the more he will admire it.
quotes.user: Terry Davis, Creator of Temple OS
